Description:
Junior Engineer at FED (FACCO Electronic Division)Setup poultry houses controllers
Testing & Commissioning of control systems (Remotely or on Site)
Troubleshooting technical issues

Skills: - Excellent ability to read/interpret functional wiring diagrams
- Basic experience on wiring on LV switchboards for any interventions

- Use of basic measuring tools (Multimeters, Clamp meters,..etc)
- Use, setting parameters, and operating principle of inverters
- Knowledge and experience in fieldbus cabling and troubleshooting (Modbus RTU, Modbus TCP, EtherCAT)
- Basic knowledge of operation and configuration of routers, IP addresses, gateways, DNS
- Basic configuration of Windows operating systems
- 3S-Codesys or IEC61131-E standard software development platform

Data.Company Industry: Animal Production; Industrial Engineering & Automation; Installation & Technical Services
